PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-13452010-10-28,  OLD INAC,  ,  , 
ActIndian Act
SubjectHalfway River Indian Reserve No. 168, B.C.
PrecisOrder requesting to consent to the exercise of the power of British Columbia to take lands in HALFWAY RIVER INDIAN RESERVE No. 168, pursuant to subsection 35(1) of the Indian Act; and to authorize, in lieu of such taking, the transfer of administration and control of the required lands to the province.
AttachmentsAttachment
